Package com.flipkart.dao

Class FlipFitCustomerDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.FlipFitCustomerDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
public class FlipFitCustomerDAOImpl extends Object implements FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
Implementation of the FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface that handles customer operations related to gyms and slots.

    • createCustomer

      public void createCustomer(int userId, String name, String phoneNumber, String address)
      Creates a new customer entry in the database.
      Specified by:
      createCustomer in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the customer.
      name - The name of the customer.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer.
      address - The address of the customer.

    • editProfile

      public void editProfile(int userId, String name, String phoneNumber, String address) throws UserNotFoundException
      Edits the profile of an existing customer in the database.
      Specified by:
      editProfile in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the customer whose profile is to be edited.
      name - The new name of the customer (null if not to be updated).
      phoneNumber - The new phone number of the customer (null if not to be updated).
      address - The new address of the customer (null if not to be updated).
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If no customer with the given userId is found.

    • viewGyms

      public List<FlipFitGym> viewGyms()
      Retrieves details of all gyms from the database.
      Specified by:
      viewGyms in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitGym objects representing all gyms.

    • viewSlots

      public HashMap<String,Integer> viewSlots(int gymId, String date) throws GymNotFoundException
      Retrieves slot availability for a specific gym on a given date from the database.
      Specified by:
      viewSlots in interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym for which slot availability is to be retrieved.
      date - The date for which slot availability is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      HashMap where keys are slot times and values are available seats.
      Throws:
      GymNotFoundException - If no gym with the given gymId is found.
